data.name: HORROR TYCOON Demo
data.detailed_description:
Try your hand at the demo version of Fear Factory where your goal is to build the haunted house of your nightmares and attempt to scare your visitors to death.

In the Demo version of the game you will get access to the first level (Backyard Haunt) and the following:
    [* 12 Scare Attractions! * 30+ Building Items (walls, doorways, windows, half walls, supports and more)* 20+ Decoration Items (broken tables, chairs, chains, spiderwebs, paintings and more)* 7 Special FX (fog, lighting, fire, water and more) ]
data.about_the_game:
Try your hand at the demo version of Fear Factory where your goal is to build the haunted house of your nightmares and attempt to scare your visitors to death.

In the Demo version of the game you will get access to the first level (Backyard Haunt) and the following:
    [* 12 Scare Attractions! * 30+ Building Items (walls, doorways, windows, half walls, supports and more)* 20+ Decoration Items (broken tables, chairs, chains, spiderwebs, paintings and more)* 7 Special FX (fog, lighting, fire, water and more) ]
data.short_description: A tycoon / tower defense hybrid where you are in charge of building the Haunted House of your nightmares and scare your guests to death before they can reach the exit!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.3 Ghz Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 570 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 3.0 Ghz Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580 Or Better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Audio

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains simulated violence, murder, gore and blood.
